ARABIC: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'My Lord, if You let me see what they have been promised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "O Lord, if I am made to see what has been promised them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pray, (O Muhammad): "My Lord, if You should bring the scourge of which they had been warned in my presence,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "Lord, if you will afflict them with punishment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Pray, “My Lord! If You show me the promise they are given,”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "My Lord! If You would show me that with which they are threatened, "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: O my Lord! if Thou shouldst make me see what they are threatened with:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'O my Lord, if Thou shouldst show me that they are promised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: My Lord! If Thou shouldst show me that which they are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pray, "Lord, if you would show me that [the punishment] of which they have been warned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou; my Lord! if Thou wilt shew me that wherewith they are threatened.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘My Lord! If You should show me what they are promised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "O my Lord! if Thou wilt show me (in my lifetime) that which they are warned against,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): " My Lord! If You would show me that with which they are threatened (torment),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “My Lord, if You would show me what they are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:93] Say: ‘My Lord! If (immā, this contains an assimilation of the conditional particle in with the extra mā) You should show me what they are promised, in the way of chastisement, that it is true, by their being slain at Badr,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad: (My Lord!) my Lord! (If Thou shouldst show me that which they are promised) of chastisement,
